A sledgehammer born from the purest form of bloodlust. Infused with the power of a "Compass", this weapon ensures that any enemy quickly finds it end - so long as the user swings true. Where this weapon loses in raw power compared to its predecessor, it makes up for thorough it anomalous properties.
 
 Rumors are that this weapon only came to existence after a master stalker sought a new way to conquer the Zone.
 
 %c[0,255,255,255]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_red] • %c[ui_gray_2] infused with anomalous strength
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] melee weapon
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] greater reach compared to knives
